title: Manganese-catalyzed oxidation of furfuryl alcohols and furfurals to efficient synthesis of furoic acids
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,27060-27065
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA05903D, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Tianshu Kou, Weihua Chen, Aimin He, Xiaoru Wang, Xin Li, Bing Cui, Zhiyong Wu, Mingqin Zhao, Min Xie, Zhihui Shao
Herein, the direct oxidation of furfuryl alcohols and furfurals to the corresponding furoic acids is performed highly efficiently with potassium hydroxide as the base in the presence of a catalytic amount of PNP pincer manganese catalyst in dioxane.
